sql.if:
and (
co_nm like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or ctrt_brno like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or ctrt_nm like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or status like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or ctrt_amt like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or (ctrt_pre || '개월') like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or (CASE WHEN premium_yn = 'Y' THEN '프리미엄' WHEN premium_yn = 'N' THEN '일반' ELSE NULL END) like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' or (CASE
WHEN TRUNC(CTRT_EXPRY_DT) - TRUNC(SYSDATE) > 0 THEN (TRUNC(CTRT_EXPRY_DT) - TRUNC(SYSDATE)) || '일' WHEN TRUNC(CTRT_EXPRY_DT) - TRUNC(SYSDATE) = 0 THEN '계약만료일' ELSE '종료' END) like '%' || #{searchWord} || '%'
)

mapper.select:
SELECT PREMIUM_YN FROM CONTRACT
WHERE CO_CD = #{coCd} AND CTRT_BGNG_DT <= SYSDATE AND SYSDATE <= CTRT_EXPRY_DT

select count(ctrt_no) from (select ctrt_no, ctrt_bgng_dt, ctrt_expry_dt, co_nm, ctrt_nm, ctrt_brno, ctrt_pre, ctrt_amt, premium_yn, CASE WHEN (CTRT_EXPRY_DT - SYSDATE) > 0 THEN '계약중' ELSE '계약만료' END AS status from contract ) c where 1=1
SELECT * FROM company b WHERE b.co_cd IN ( SELECT a.co_cd FROM contract a WHERE a.ctrt_no = #{ctrtNo} )
